body:

# PR Summary

I have just used the templates from the vs code docs and only changed the tag on the image (hence why I kept their oroginal license header)
This makes it easier to have a development environment that is always clean and works out of the box.
I kept the extensions to be installed the same but excluded the rarely needed but expensive cmake/c++ one.
To initialise the container I execute a dotnet restore
